

{{html:

<form class="form-horizontal" ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="CreateOrEditDesktopBucketController">
<fieldset>
<div class="control-group">
    <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Set User Login</label>
    <div class="controls">
        <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-xlarge" placeholder="E-mail" type="text" ng-model="bucket.email">
    </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
    <label class="control-label" for="radios">Select User Privileges</label>
    <div class="controls">
        <label class="radio inline" for="radios-0">
        <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="User" ng-model="bucket.userType">User</label>
        <label class="radio inline" for="radios-1">
        <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="Administrator" ng-model="bucket.userType">Administrator</label>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="form-actions">
    <button class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-show="isNewBucket" ng-disabled="!isValid()" ng-click="create()">Create Desktop Bucket</button>
    <button class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-show="!isNewBucket" ng-disabled="!isValid()" ng-click="update()">Update Desktop Bucket</button>
</div>



</fieldset>
</form>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/DesktopBuckets/CreateOrEditDesktopBucketController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/others.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
